title: Diagnostics
description: Troubleshooting application issues using logging, tracing, metrics, and debugging tools. Core tools include `dotnet-counters`, `dotnet-dump`, `dotnet-trace`, and `dotnet-monitor` for production diagnostics. Use `EventSource` and `DiagnosticSource` for custom instrumentation; OpenTelemetry for distributed tracing.
shortDescription: Logging, tracing, metrics, and diagnostic tools for troubleshooting.
